author: Odeinoichus
title: But she has a new Hat.
review:
Set #71009 Wayland Smithers: Mr. Burns Sycophantic lapdog has joined the LEGO Simpsons and he has an awesome accessory if you're a fan of older seasons of The Simpsons.

Smithers has no printing on the legs and a relatively plain torso print with a suit jacket in a dull olive tone a white undershirt and a purple bowtie. His head sculpt captures his look quite nicely and he looks pretty good. His accessory is two tiles, a 1x4 tile with studs and a 1x4 printed tile to attach to it. The print is hilarious for what it is, Malibu Stacy, with a New Hat! Such an awesomely fun nod to one of my favorite episodes.

Overall I'd recommend tracking him down if you missed him back when this Series was released. He's a great looking character and will compliment Mr. Burns quite nicely from Series 1. Plus he comes with a great looking accessory.
